Title: Relates to the hours worked by nurses
Summary: Restricts the consecutive hours of required work by nurses in the home care setting except in emergencies; does not prohibit a nurse from voluntarily working overtime.
LawCode: Amd ยง167, Lab L; amd ยง6510-e, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law and the education law, in relation to the hours worked by nurses
